scripts.builder:generate: cd app/visual_generator/entities && rimraf dist && tsc &&  cd ../../../ && node ./generator/ejs.js entitiesDir=./app/visual_generator/entities/dist
scripts.main:build: cd app/main_frontend && npm run build && cd ../main_backend && npm run build
scripts.main:start: cd app/main_frontend && npm run dev & cd app/main_backend && npm run start:dev
scripts.main:generate: cd entities && rimraf dist && tsc &&  cd ../ && node ./generator/ejs.js entitiesDir=./entities/dist
scripts.old-builder:start: cd app/builder_frontend && npm run dev & cd app/builder_backend && npm run start:dev
scripts.old-builder:generate: cd entities-builder && rimraf dist && tsc && cd ../ && node ./generator/ejs.js entitiesDir=./entities-builder/dist
